column4: hi, im about to try a non-Microsoft OS for the first time, is ubuntu something to try?
i want to go away from Windows-like super multimedia-shopping-buttons-and shit to more slimed OS, is ubuntu ok or is it full of shit to make it "stupid-user-friendly"?
